content.p: Explore our videos and webinars to find out more about studying at the School of Economics, University of Nottingham Malaysia. What Can Economics Degrees Do for You? By Dr Teo Wing Leong What can you do with an economics degree and why should you pursue an economics degree at Nottingham Malaysia? How to Choose Your Degree? Insights from Economics By Dr Teo Wing Leong How to choose your degree? An economic approach: choose the degree within your constraints that best maximise your objective functions, be it interests or job prospects or some combinations of both. Studying Economics: Secure Your Personal Economy in the Future? (in Chinese) By Dr Teo Wing Leong (Watch full version here.) Many think economics is just about numbers and theories, but it is a misconception. In fact, economics relates to our daily lives in both obvious and subtle ways: from work and running a household to leisure and travel, all are economic activities. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
